definition[0]: a day when you say that you are sick and do not go to work, even though you are not really sick
example[0]: Looks like he’s thrown another sickie (=pretended to be sick and not gone to work).
definition[2]: when you say that you are ill and do not go to work, even though you are not really ill
example[1]: He was so fed up that he decided to throw a sickie instead of going into the office.
